Name: My Home VR
About the game: Overview This game is a VR relaxation game. You can freely replace the furniture and create your own space. Enjoy a wonderful VR experience surrounded by beautiful scenery. Detailed explanation Title : My Home VR Genre : VR relaxation simulation Production tools : Unity 2018.4.4f1 Precautions This game is a VR game. It has been confirmed to work with HTC VIVE. Please be aware that we are not liable for any trouble that may occur when using this work.
